document_data.mainbody:
hongolir Villa was the family estate of the Waterdhavian noble house Thongolir.
thumb|right|270px|Map showing the location of the Thongolir Villa (labeled $49) circa 1372 DR.
The Thongolir Villa was located in the Sea Ward of Waterdeep,
This building complex consisted of two high-quality buildings, one that was two stories tall and another that stood a single story tall, one being the mansion proper and the other a guesthouse.
Like many Waterdhavian villas, it was a walled estate featuring a landscaped garden.Evidence of this information can be seen in how the villa is depicted on maps.
